title: Research
text:
My current research focuses on optimizing the lead optimization phase using efficient exploitation / exploration trade-off strategies.

title: Resume
text: PhD candidate specialized in machine learning for drug discovery, with an emphasis on improving exploration and exploitation during lead optimization. Conducting my research within the Theoretical Chemistry Group at ENS-PSL and the Integrated Drug Discovery team at Sanofi.
